description:
On the school sports day, Komi isn`t sure how to properly cheer for her classmates, but she does her best. Then, it`s her turn to run the relay race.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just Sports Day. / It`s Just Emotional Pangs. / It`s Just Photo Stickers.
Taiikusai Desu. / Chotto Kurushii You na Kimochi Desu. / Print Seal Desu.
体育祭です. / ちょっと苦しいような気持ちです. / プリントシールです.
